name.description: the name of the enum, lowercase and underscore-delimited

package.description: single-word package name for this enum

group.description: when set, places this enum inside a folder group

icon.description: one of the SVGs available in ./assets

values.description: the possible values of this enum's members

tags.description: simple flags for this model; unused

proper.description: overrides the computed proper-case version of the name

config.description: a config object for this enum; unused
